briefTitle: Study of Glycopyrronium in Subjects With Axillary Hyperhidrosis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Vehicle-controlled Efficacy and Safety Study of Glycopyrronium in Subjects With Axillary Hyperhidrosis
summary: The study is a randomized, double-blind, vehicle controlled, parallel group study, designed to assess the efficacy and safety of glycopyrronium topical wipes, once daily, compared to vehicle in subjects with axillary hyperhidrosis.
